the scenario where everyone cooperates:

Alice FUNDING 81bee81bbb08606c812e1fdda9e883fe72b2e73d3c723fc79c60906dc93e2b70
Bob FUNDING 03964e682cbf0998ecff4eb2ae203ffb5fdeeabe4eb7345c9e55aa9aad48687d
Bob FUNDING 2 e561714e0a7d3c4bce1b4b57717cdb8adeda14f00ef0d1a169eeef93176f3bf5
Alice MARGIN DEPOSITION ad70a2832cd21566fff724314dd6db55c32c4dc2a800b115ac6c188688b91de8
Alice GUARANTEE DEPOSITION 74e7414b08947fa5a2b49a177e7705320a73ea817c645771e71a2df9a8edab68
Bob PREMIUM DEPOSITION 25407296a6b9aecc93c11200e6d14336c4a6ee449c1dca86341881196e454858
Bob PRINCIPAL 6ab7df6cb804a4cad027e4c428d821c80055c0bcb4d8de6d8ab5fa328a75834d
Carol HTLC 5a675e33bfe905118e5630e365f6a2a088569697e466cb00bb3deaf31f566c39
Alice REDEMPTION b7b8ff6817e146a70ba9e2965cb5cb7031ff8d648b9e94b8a4d6808f910eb6c5
Bob HTLC OUTPUT d1e32eaeb324d8df78bcf94d3d969ca96dcf8d29b27b9cc8a3509094b76c25af
Alice HTLC OUTPUT b293c2bcb5f0c711624d8c5455d3698e0e28b9a8141779155045cd69c16d49d5
Carol HTLC OUTPUT a2a2b2cf315e639f475d1686378cc60ee923230cbebad27f24652efb5aa94a62


the scenario that Alice defaults:

Alice FUNDING 9ddbfc435a5cbd3b82e5e78887f0552a4a4a92102c753e07d78965f25da8c53b
Bob FUNDING f45b7c2df2688623ca1d2bf0dbd71ddc1b72879f5e4ca7472c01c37e0d2f614a
Bob FUNDING 2 bbc6d968554539ae137a052ebad4b01c1feff1b07e19f20f383fc3f774b8c48a
Alice REFUND 1741ca06fa61c92e7b9f5efa26dd219abca47e345d6d95176a479c0b6b37c0df
Bob REFUND 24d21de348622b64f424826224a17a8279f8da0e3fcd757639d9e872ea417a4b
